list(APPEND SOURCE_SQLITE sqlite3.c sqlite3.h)

source_group("" FILES ${SOURCE_SQLITE})

add_library(sqlite STATIC ${SOURCE_SQLITE})
set_target_properties(sqlite PROPERTIES LANGUAGE C LINKER_LANGUAGE C)
set_target_properties(sqlite PROPERTIES FOLDER third_party)
